attributes.action: A vote of NO confidence in The Elected Members of Parliament.
attributes.additional_details:
This is a demand from the People of Great Britain for the truth.
For Members of Parliament to represent their People, and to be held accountable.
The current state of our "government" is disgraceful, and nothing but in house power struggles occupy the time and minds of those whom are elected to protect this Union, and its residents.
We are the people, we have the right to elect those to represent us - and we are calling a vote of NO CONFIDENCE in those that currently do.
attributes.background: Recent events have made it clear to the People of this Union that the present elected MP's have not the hearts nor minds of our democracy at the forefront of their agendas. A vote of NO CONFIDENCE is expressed in all elected Members of Parliament, and a General Election is demanded 2016.
